title: R(k,S) as a Regime Response Surface in Energy-Flow Cosmology
subtitle: A Unified Framework for Structure-Dependent Gravitational Response

concepts.R_k_S: Regime response function encoding gravitational deviation from GR as function of scale k and structural state S
concepts.S_state_variable: Structural maturity parameter measuring nonlinear structure accumulation
concepts.L1_regime: CMB epoch with S≈0 and μ≈1 (standard GR)
concepts.L2_regime: Late universe with S>0 and μ>1 (enhanced growth)

falsification_criteria: Tomographic consistency: All redshift bins must follow single R(k,S) surface
Trend sign matching: Probes with overlapping (k,S) must show same deviation sign
S-gradient prediction: Predicted S8 offset must match observed redshift evolution
